description:
The gang plays the "Dive Game" to explore their dreams after Tomoki’s recent vision of the mysterious angel. Upon returning to the real world, Sugata finds that the search for answers has only raised new questions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kimi mo Nuge! Kaette Kita Yuusha
You Strip, Too! The Return of the Full-Frontal Hero
キミも脱げ! 帰ってきた全裸王(ユウシャ)
